message.body: Just wondering if you have any interest in Creation this year?
i don't think i'll be able to... there's a significant chance that i'll have to live off campus next year, so i'm going to have to work all summer and save everything i can.
housing filled up before i got there. i'm in the top third of the waiting list, though, theoretically.
How many ppl short are they for housing? That would be crazy!!! Maybe you should learn to drive. :)

there are 606 people on the waiting list but that number will go down as study abroad acceptances go out. if i could drive i'd need to pay for a car, insurance, and parking too, so i don't see how that's exceedingly helpful.
Are there many places near campus? That is crazy!
